document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel's conservatives appeared set to keep control in the eastern state of saxony-anhalt, election projections showed on sunday, but face a much tougher credibility test next week.
document.title: merkel party set to hold onto german state
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel's conservatives appeared set to keep control in the eastern state of saxony-anhalt, election projections showed on sunday, but face a much tougher credibility test next week.
